pages.title: Ancient Scroll
pages.text: The Ancient Scroll is a powerful artifact, it is the only way to summon the Egyptian God of Death: Anubis... $(br2)To find an ancient scroll you will need to craft a brush and go diving into some ocean ruins, when you find one look for some suspicious sand. Use the brush on the suspicious sand to reveal a lost item, if you are lucky you will find the Ancient Scroll

pages.title: Brush Crafting Recipe
pages.text: Use the Brush on Suspicious Sand to reveal lost items!

pages.title: Ancient Pyramid
pages.text: The Ancient Pyramid is where you will find The Shrine Of Anubis

pages.name: Anubis Shrine
pages.text: This is The Shrine Of Anubis, Place an Eye of Ender in each slot, Then use your Ancient Scroll on the Centre Block when it is Lit

Anubis is The Hardest Boss Fight in Elegant Expansions...$(br2)Whilst his health doesnt seem high at only 200 Anubis has the unique ability to regenerate back to max health up to 3 times during a fight, Each time he regenerates he will summon hoards of mummies to attack you as he regenerates. Once you finally defeat him he will drop a Gem Upgrade Template (Used to upgrade Diamond Gear to Infused Gem Gear) and a random item, if you are very Lucky this Random item may even be Anubis's Staff itself. The Staff Of Mummies!
